segments.text: I'd have a look at some pots and pans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We've got several kinds . All are made of different materials .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind is most durable , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , here is one made of duralumin . That's cheap and durable . Over there we've also got some made of stainless steel , and those over there are enamel ones .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll have the stainless ones . They look very solid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . Stainless steel products are always popular .
segments.speaker: S2
